prompts: Create a spooky ghost-type Pokemon that resembles a pumpkin with a playful spirit.
I want an adorable pumpkin Pokemon that has a mischievous grin and charming eyes.
Generate a ghostly Pokemon with dark, leafy features and a round orange body.
Make a Halloween-themed Pokemon that combines elements of a pumpkin and a ghost.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies autumn, featuring a round shape and a whimsical face.
Design a ghost-type with a pumpkin-like body and a friendly demeanor.
Give me a Pokemon that looks like a pumpkin with a haunting twist and vibrant colors.
